Bikin Haru! Hanya Makan Telur Rebus, Satpam Tua Ini Ditraktir Shabu-shabu
06 Nov 2019, 11:15 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Banyak aksi kebaikan yang menginspirasi banyak orang. Seperti kebaikan gadis ini. Satpam tua yang biasa makan telur rebus ditraktir makan shabu-shabu.Lewat unggahan viral di Facebook, kisah kakek tua yang masih bekerja sebagai satpam atau petugas keamanan ini menarik banyak simpati netizen. Dikabarkan World of Buzz (06/11), seorang pengguna Facebook asal Thailand membagikan kisahnya saat sedang makan shabu-shabu dengan kekasihnya.Baca Juga: Pertama Kali Cicip Sushi, Pria Ini Malah Muntahkan Salmon Segar "Saat itu saya dan kekasih tengah makan shabu-shabu, kami menyadari ada seorang kakek tua yang bekerja sebagai satpam berdiri di luar restoran. Ia tertangkap tengah melihat ke arah makanan kami, namun langsung mengalihkan pandangannya ke arah lain, dan pergi dari depan restoran," jelas pengguna Facebook tersebut.


Foto: Istimewa

Tak lama setelah itu, satpam ini kembali ke depan restoran dan menatap makanan yang dihidangkan di dalam sana. Akhirnya mereka berdua tersadar, bahwa satpam tua itu mungkin kelaparan, dan ingin makan."Kami akhirnya keluar restoran dan menemukan paman tua itu tengah duduk di luar, sambil memakan telur rebus. Kami tanya ia sedang apa, dan sang kakek berkata bahwa dia lapar," lanjutnya.Akhirnya dirinya dan kekasih sepakat untuk mengajak kakek itu makan bersama di dalam restoran. Awalnya sang kakek bingung dengan hidangan shabu-shabu, yang sebelumnya ia tidak pernah makan. Tapi akhirnya sang kakek setuju untuk ikut makan ke dalam restoran, meski awalnya ia dengan sopan menolak ajakan pasangan ini.


Foto: Istimewa

Meski awalnya sang kakek sedikit ragu, tapi karena sang kekasih yang terus mengajaknya ke dalam, sang kakek jadi merasa diterima. Bahkan sang kekasih sampai harus berbohong bahwa dia baru saja menang uang undian, agar sang kakek mau dibayari makanannya.Ketika sang kakek mulai menikmati makanannya, dengan senyuman bahagianya. Sang kakek mengucapkan terima kasih, dan mengatakan bahwa shabu-shabu itu enak.Di akhir acara makan, sang kakek tetap memaksa untuk membayar makanan yang ia santap. Meski sudah ditolak berkali-kali oleh mereka berdua. Akhirnya sang kakek baru setuju ditraktir, setelah mereka berdua berjanji bahwa sang kakek boleh mentraktir mereka berdua, ketika sang kakek sudah gajian.Kisah ini menyentuh banyak hati netizen. Jarang ada orang yang memperhatikan lingkungan sekitar, ketika sedang makan di dalam restoran.


Foto: Istimewa

"Anda dan kekasih sangat baik. Menginspirasi orang lain, untuk terus berbuat kebaikan di manapun. Terus berbuat kebaikan!" puji seorang netizen.Hingga saat ini, unggahan ini sudah dibagikan sebanyak 39 ribu kali, dan disukai lebih dari 150 ribu pengguna Facebook.Kisah kebaikan seperti ini bukan pertama kalinya terjadi. Sebelumnya ada pemulung bernama Pak Slamet, yang ditraktir makan steak untuk pertama kalinya, yang seumur hidupnya belum pernah merasakan daging sapi.Baca Juga: Ekspresi Senang Pak Slamet, Pemulung yang Baru Pertama Kali Makan Daging Sapi Simak Video "Nikmatnya Shabu-Shabu khas Mongolia dengan Potongan Daging Domba"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sob/odi)

Make a haunt! Only Eat Boiled Eggs, This Old Security Guard treated with Methamphetamine
Nov 6 2019, 11:15 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Many acts of kindness that inspire many people. Like this girl's kindness. The old security guard who used to eat boiled eggs was treated to eat crystal meth. Through viral uploads on Facebook, the story of the old grandfather who still worked as a security guard or security officer attracted many sympathizers of netizens. Reported by World of Buzz (11/06), a Facebook user from Thailand shared his story while eating shabu-shabu with his lover. Also Read: First Time Tasting Sushi, This Man Is Instead Spewing Fresh Salmon " crystal meth, we realized there was an old grandfather who worked as a security guard standing outside the restaurant. He was caught looking at our food, but immediately turned his gaze in the other direction, and left the front of the restaurant, "explained the Facebook user.


Photo: Special

Shortly after, the security guard returned to the front of the restaurant and stared at the food served there. Eventually they both realized that the old security guard might be starving, and wanted to eat. "We finally left the restaurant and found the old uncle sitting outside, eating boiled eggs. We asked him what he was doing, and the grandfather said that he was hungry, "he continued. Finally he and his lover agreed to invite the grandfather to eat together in the restaurant. At first the grandfather was confused by the shabu-shabu dish, which he had never eaten before. But finally the grandfather agreed to come to eat into the restaurant, although at first he politely refused the couple's invitation.


Photo: Special

Although at first the grandfather was a little hesitant, but because of the lover who kept taking him inside, the grandfather felt accepted. Even the lover had to lie that he had just won the lottery money, so that the grandfather would be paid for his food. When the grandfather began to enjoy his food, with a happy smile. The grandfather thanked, and said that methamphetamine was delicious. At the end of the meal, the grandfather still insisted on paying for the food he was eating. Although it had been rejected many times by both of them. Finally the new grandfather agreed to be treated, after they both promised that the grandfather could treat them both, when the grandfather had payday. This story touched many netizens' hearts. There are rarely people who pay attention to the environment, while eating in a restaurant.


Photo: Special

"You and your lover are very kind. Inspire others, to continue to do good wherever. Keep doing good!" praise a netizen. Until now, this upload has been shared 39 thousand times, and liked by more than 150 thousand Facebook users. The story of kindness is not the first time this has happened. Previously there was a scavenger named Mr. Slamet, who was treated to eat steak for the first time, who in his life had never tasted beef. Lamb Cutlet "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (friend / odi)
